content: I'm considering upgrading my suspension on my 2018 Honda Civic Si and I was wondering if you could recommend some good options. By the way, I recently participated in an autocross event and made some adjustments to my suspension which really helped me improve my time - on the first day, I averaged 62.5 seconds, but after tweaking my suspension, I was able to shave off 2.5 seconds on the second day.
